title: Labyrinth
rootContent: You are walking down a dark, dingy hallway. Where would you like to go?

root.storyContent: You are walking down a dark, dingy hallway. Where would you like to go?

currentNode.storyContent: I don't feel like writing this story anymore to tell you the truth

1.storyContent: You are walking down a dark, dingy hallway. Where would you like to go?

2.storyContent: You see cobwebs in front of you and a dark shadowy figure. What would you like to do next?

3.storyContent: There is a giant spider coming down the hallway towards you.

4.storyContent: You see a vial on the ground with a strange glowing liquid.

5.storyContent: You approach the figure and you can see nothing but darkness beneath his hood. 'What brings you this way, traveler?'  he asks.

6.storyContent: You have no weapons and were slain by the spider. Try again?

7.storyContent: You charmed the spider with your great personality. He will now fight alongside you.

8.storyContent: You picked up the vial and put it in your bag.

9.storyContent: For some reason you decided to drink the weird liquid. You died. Whoops.

10.storyContent: You continue down the hallway. You see a glowing door to your right.

11.storyContent: He pulls out a dagger and slays you. Stronger than he looks!

12.storyContent: I don't feel like writing this story anymore to tell you the truth

13.storyContent: 'Well you've come to the right place. Allow me to aid you in your search.'

14.storyContent: You continue down the hallway with the mysterious stranger at your feet.

16.storyContent: Suddenly he pulls a knife out of his pocket and lunges at you! You sense his attack and are able to parry and throw him onto the ground.

17.storyContent: You spare the stranger. He thanks you, and offers you a potion as an apology. He claims it grants you super strength.

18.storyContent: You murder the stranger with his own knife. Karma shall get you soon...

19.storyContent: You drink the potion and immediately feel an unbelievable strength flowing through your veins.

20.storyContent: You shatter the vial in his face. He immediately grows super strong and rips through his shirt. He grabs your throat and strangles you.

21.storyContent: It seems he cast some sort of curse on you. You find yourself getting weaker and weaker until you can hardly stand up. Soon you pass away in great agony.

23.storyContent: You kick down the door. There's a huge explosion- seems like you set off some sort of nuclear reaction. You died.

24.storyContent: You round the corner and come across a strange.. bowling ball?

25.storyContent: You and your new spider friend continue on your way. You run into a creepy-looking old man who offers you 4000 rupees for the spider.

26.storyContent: 'Well uhh.. I'll trade you this really cute puppy for him'

27.storyContent: The spider turns around and bites your head off for your betrayal.

28.storyContent: You trade the giant spider for a really cute puppy. Now the puppy accompanies you on your way. 'I get it,' says the spider

29.storyContent: 'Okay whatever man,' he says, and lets you on your way.

30.storyContent: A huge marshmallow appears in front of you and starts speaking Polish. You have no idea what he's saying because you don't speak Polish.

5: 'I am looking for the holy grail'
10: Try the handle to the door
